message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I rejected your offer because I believe in fairness. Let's split it evenly.
You want fairness, I want a bit more
How about we meet in the middle? This offer is closer to your previous one but still acknowledges my earlier rejection.
I'm willing to take a bigger risk, meet me here or we both lose
Okay, Alice, let's be realistic.  You drive a hard bargain, but we're running out of time. I'll meet you halfway between our previous offers. Take it or leave it - this is my final offer.
